# LLM Information for pablokvitca.com

## Site Purpose

Personal website and technical blog for Pablo Kvitca, a software engineer.

## Content Overview

This site contains:
- Technical blog posts about software development
- Project showcases with technology details
- Professional information about the author

## Primary Topics

- Software Development
- Web Technologies
- TypeScript/JavaScript
- React and Frontend Development
- System Design
- Machine Learning (occasional)

## Content Structure

### Blog (/blog)
Technical articles and tutorials. Each post includes:
- Title and abstract
- Publication date
- Tags for categorization (technology:*, topic:*, language:*)
- Full article content in MDX format

### Projects (/projects)
Software project showcases. Each project includes:
- Title and description
- Technology stack (via tags)
- Project status (active/completed/archived)
- Links to GitHub and live demos

### About (/about)
Information about the author and contact details.

### Colophon (/colophon)
Technical details about how this website is built.

## Technology Stack

- Astro (static site generator)
- React (interactive components)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- MDX (content format)
- Cloudflare Pages (hosting)

## Contact

Best way to reach the author: LinkedIn
https://linkedin.com/in/pablokvitca

## Source Code

https://github.com/pablokvitca/personal-website
